item.title: Edit mockapi resource limit
item.description: https://www.mockapi.io/ - MockAPI is a simple tool that lets you easily mock up APIs, generate custom data, and preform operations on it using RESTful interface. MockAPI is meant to be used as a prototyping/testing/learning tool. 1 project/4 resources per project for free.

item.title: Added landings for web landing page inspiration
item.description: https://landings.dev/ - [Web Screenshots] Find the best landing pages for your design inspiration based on your preference.

item.title: Updated Readme.md
item.description: https://www.setools.xyz/ - This website provide free tools for developers and everyone. We are having tools like base64 encoder, URL Encoder, character counter, SHA256, MD5 Hash.

item.title: Added QR Code Robot - free QR Code generator
item.description: https://qr-code-robot.com) — Free QR Code Generator. Offers possibilty to generate a QR Code for a webpage, sms, email, wifi auth or free text. Plans to offer also a generator for file sharing (pdf, mp3, video - Robot](https://qr-code-robot.com) — Free QR Code Generator. Offers possibilty to generate a QR Code for a webpage, sms, email, wifi auth or free text. Plans to offer also a generator for file sharing (pdf, mp3, video) and also a scan tracking of QR code.

item.title: Beampipe.io added
item.description: https://beampipe.io - Beampipe is simple, privacy-focussed web analytics. free for up to 5 domains & 10k monthly page views.

item.title: Add storage limit for GH Codespaces free tier
item.description: https://github.com/codespaces - Development environments that are hosted in the cloud. 120-core hours and 15 GB codespaces storage available for free every month.
